amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium any regulatory actions required to implement the Telemarketing and Consumer Fraud and Abuse Prevention Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of February 21, 1995) to exempt from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium any regulatory actions required to implement the Telemarketing and Consumer Fraud and Abuse Prevention Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fattah amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 254 (Roll no. 171).
